name: @tonutils/overlay
description: A powerful and easy-to-use Overlay Protocol implementation for Node.js, designed to enable seamless communication and data exchange between peers in a decentralized network. This package provides an intuitive API for building, managing, and maintaining overlay networks, empowering developers to create resilient and high-performance decentralized applications with minimal effort.
author: thekiba <hr@thekiba.io>, goreactdev <goreactdev12@gmail.com>
